term.title: equilibrium sedimentation

item.text: A method by which the distribution of the concentration of the solute or dispersed component in a dilute solution or dispersion along the centrifuge cell is measured at sedimentation equilibrium and the results are interpreted in terms of molar masses or their distribution, or both.
